snippet: ROME, Sept. 2 (AP)--British planes attempting to blast Italian islands in the Red Sea off the Eritrean shore lost one of their number at Harmil Island, eighty miles from Massawa, an Italian High Command communique said today....

headline.main: ITALIANS IN AFRICA DOWN TWO PLANES; Report British Losses in Red Sea Attacks on Islands and an Eritrean Port SUDAN FORCE IS BOMBED Haifa Now Said to Be Useless --Near East Trade Centers Planned by London Haifa Reported Damaged Malta Repulses Raiders Port Pounded All Day New Trade Centers Weighed

lead_paragraph: ROME, Sept. 2 (AP)--British planes attempting to blast Italian islands in the Red Sea off the Eritrean shore lost one of their number at Harmil Island, eighty miles from Massawa, an Italian High Command communique said today.
